Register User. Uses the database interface to add a new user to the database. The server is not concerned with how it is written just that the arguments are passed to storage.

addClientToItem

public void addClientToItem(AuctionClient client,
                            int itemID)
                     throws RemoteException
Add Client to Item. Searches through the rooms to find the one with the respective item and then adds the client to that item. Also replays a message to the client using the dispatchMessage() method about this.

Specified by:
addClientToItem in interface AuctionServer
Parameters:
client - AuctionClient
itemID - int
Throws:
RemoteException

sendBidToServer

public void sendBidToServer(AuctionClient myClient,
                            int itemID,
                            String amount)
                     throws RemoteException
Send Bid. Takes the client, itemID and an amount and sends the bid amount (parsed to double) to the appropriate room for the room to make the bid via the addBid() method.

Specified by:
sendBidToServer in interface AuctionServer
Parameters:
myClient - AuctionClient
itemID - int
amount - String
Throws:
RemoteException
